name: find
descr: find all the accounts having at least one field containing one or more of the search term

name: show
descr: display the details of the account. If a search term is used, it must match only one account.

name: showpass
descr: display the password in the console. Press any key to hide it again.

name: copy
descr: copy the field <field> of the given account to the clipboard. Field is one of: name, pseudo, pass, email, notes.

name: edit
descr: edit the given account. Leave the password empty if you don't want to modify it.

name: load
descr: load a json file from the filesystem and encrypt it.

name: dump
descr: save the content of the given session into a json file (non encrypted)

name: pass
descr: copy the password of the given account to the clipboard. Same as copy pass.

name: help
descr: show the usage of the given command.

name: man
descr: print the help for all commands.
